text: Egha a uaghan arazir bar igharazim gami. A Hinomɨn Danganir Zarimɨn uan otaribav suegha, aseba bagha ofan bar isia mɨghɨribar mɨn me tue. Egha a fomɨra nguazir kamɨn ikezir gumazamizibar arazir kurabar gɨn zui. Ezɨ Ikiavɨra Itir God bar men arazibar aghuagha me batuegha, nguazir kam inigha Israelia ganɨngi.
